page.title: 05Tourism.
page.content: This part of Dawlish is particularly inviting to the tourist. It has a beautiful setting with the river running down through the center to the sea. Dawlish is famous for its {black swans}which live on the river_ and also other birds. A chart describing the birds inhabiting the area is displayed. Dawlish Lawn provides amenities for many local events, during the summer Rotary Fayre, Flower Show, Church Fetes to name a few. There is also a band stand which is used for live concerts. The whole area provides plenty of recreation space for children with a park at one end. Dawlish has a Carnival week every August. There is also a small theatre which produces some excellent shows.
